      Methods in by.roma.telecom.dao that throw DaoException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Account AccountDao.addCallPlan​(int accountID, int callPlanID)
      Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables, if account has an active call plan, that call plan will be ceased.
      User UserDao.authorization​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password)
      Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean User type object.
      Account AccountDao.blockAccount​(int accountID)
      Executes Update query.
      User UserDao.blockUser​(int id)
      Executes Update query, applies changes value to "true" in database column name isBlocked.
      User UserDao.changePass​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String passOld, java.lang.String passNew)
      Executes Select and Update queries, assembles and returns updated bean User type object.
      Account AccountDao.changePhoneNumber​(int accountID, java.lang.String newPhoneNumber)
      Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables.
      User UserDao.changeUserRole​(int id)
      Executes Update query, applies administrator rights to user with ID passed to the method.
      Account AccountDao.chargeToAccount​(int accountID, float amount)
      Executes Update query.
      Account AccountDao.connectPhoneNumber​(int accountID, java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Executes Select, Insert, Update queries in several tables.
      void UserDao.deleteUser​(int id)
      Executes Delete query.
      Account AccountDao.findAccountByPhoneNumber​(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      Executes Select query.
      Account AccountDao.getAccountDetails​(int accountID)
      Executes Select query, assembles and returns bean Account type object.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> UtilDao.getAvailablePhoneNumbers()
      Executes Select query, assembles a List type String of available phone numbers from database.
      java.util.List<Account> AccountDao.getListOfAllAccounts()
      Executes Select query.
      java.util.List<User> UserDao.getListOfAllUsers()
      Executes Select query, gathers all records of users from database except those that are marked as administrators.
      void UserDao.insertUser​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String addressL1, java.lang.String addressL2, java.lang.String addressL3, java.lang.String pass)
      Executes Insert query.

      Executes Insert query.
